summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Colloidal Oatmeal Lotion by Lucky Super Soft, Moisturizing Lotion with Natural Oatmeal, Non-Scented, Fragrance Free, No Parabens and Phatalates, Perfect for Face and Whole Body, 12 bottles, 12 fl.oz.
Review Date: 2021/09/23
Store: Lucky Super Soft
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Lucky Super Soft', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '144.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body, Face', 'Package Dimensions': '13.46 x 8.35 x 6.57 inches; 10.58 Pounds'}
Review Text: These are absolutely perfect for my dry skin! I am on accutane and have really dry skin. This has been a perfect solution. I like it better than comparable brands like aveeno. It leaves my skin feeling moisturized and NOT oily. It has a slight oatmeal scent that smells good but it is not overpowering at all. It feels like such quality going into my skin. I am obsessed. It is nice it comes in such a large quantity because I have a bottle at work at home and everywhere!
Review Title: Perfect!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: YUHFERA Press on Nails Kit 30Pcs Fake Nails Short Coffin Nail Tips with Designs Solid Color Full Cover False Nails Set Artificial Acrylic Nails for DIY Nail Art Salon Women Girls Gift(Blue bird)
Review Date: 2021/10/15
Store: YUHFERA
Average Rating: 2.8
Product Details: {'Size': 'Medium', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'YUHFERA', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '2.95 x 2.91 x 1.06 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '785382442227'}
Review Text: Ok. I do not have very long finger nails. These press on nails were shorter than my actual nail. It looked terrible because my finger nail was poking out the other side. I didn’t want to clip my nails down just for a set of press on nails that were way too short. I am not into super long gaudy nails, but these are not even a natural length. However, if you are happy with the length, the stickers included to press the mails on to are pretty good! They lasted well and came off my nail easily when I needed them off.
Review Title: Great stickers, super short nails
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Gryph & IvyRose Coat of Arms Hydrating Lotion for Kids - Hydrating Moisturizer with Shea Butter & Coconut Oil - All Natural, Sustainable, Cruelty Free, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Vegan - USA Made - 8oz
Review Date: 2021/11/07
Store: Gryph & IvyRose
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Gryph & IvyRose', 'Scent': 'Coconut Shea', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'Sweet Almond Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.28 x 2.24 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '856991007210'}
Review Text: This lotion has a very subtle scent. If that is what you are into, it is a great purchase. It does moisturize well and I feel confident letting my daughter use it since it is made of quality materials. The little bottle is cute and easy to use. I love the fact that it is made of natural ingredients.
Review Title: Very subtle scent
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 21pcs with storage box for girls big bow hairpin ribbon full cover flower hairpin baby toddler hair accessories
Review Date: 2021/11/08
Store: Havtyyise
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Havtyyise', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Babies', 'Material': 'Linen', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Product Dimensions': '3.55 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 0.53 Ounces'}
Review Text: The little box these come in is absolutely adorable! I love that they come in a cute little storage bin. I also love that they come with duplicates of each one for little pigtails. These are perfect for a toddler and they have nice fabric underneath to keep them from pulling the hair!
Review Title: So sweet!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: A24 Cleansing Oil - Makeup Remover, Deep Cleansing, Non-Stripping, 99.75% Natural Ingredients, Vegan Formula, Ideal for All Skin Types… (Cleansing Oil to Foam)
Review Date: 2022/01/02
Store: A24
Product Description: ['A24 Oil to Foam Cleansing Oil is a product that combines “oil and moisture balance” and “powerful cleansing”. When it comes into contact with water, it is a cleansing oil that changes from a light oil texture to a dense foam texture. Its unique transforming texture will result in a thoroughly cleansed and balanced skin to enhance efficacy of the skin care products to follow. 6 premium plant based oils are a powerful lipid soluble antioxidant to soften, moisturize and nourish the skin. It also helps remove dirt and impurities deep within pores.']
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'A24', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Material Feature': 'Hypoallergenic', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 1.7 x 1.7 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'A24'}
Review Text: This makeup remover is really oily. Leaves my face feeling really oily. Also, it does not remove waterproof eye makeup well at all.
Review Title: Super oily
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Makeup Headband - 3PCS Spa Headband For Washing Face Skincare Towel Headbands Shower Hair Band
Review Date: 2022/04/03
Store: Tinpin
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Color': 'Pink,Silver', 'Material': 'Foam', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Brand': 'Tinpin', 'Size': '3 piece Set', 'Package Dimensions': '8.35 x 7.17 x 2.13 inches; 3.99 Ounces'}
Review Text: This heaband is fun and soft but the fur sheds a bit and was getting everywhere.
Review Title: Shedding fur
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Birthday Gift, Yachyee hair removal device
Review Date: 2022/04/14
Store: Yachyee
Product Description: ["What's in Yachyee Relaxing Gifts for Women:", '--- 12 oz Rose Gold insulated stainless steel tumbler with a reusable straw and cleaning brush, with the words ""Beauty begins the moment you love yourself"". --- Flower Petal Bath Bombs, drop them into the tub to relax among the delicate aromas of vanilla and lavender petals. --- Scented Candle, made of 100% soy wax, luxurious and all-natural, can immediately turn your space into a little serene and peaceful flower garden. --- Rose Bar Soap, made with natural flower essential oil to bring you to a dreamland of lavender cloud. --- Beautiful Key Bottle Opener and heart shape Wine Bottle Stopper --- Greeting Card, you can write your special blessing to her. 🎈 DON\'T FORGET TO SELECT ""THIS ORDER CONTAINS A GIFT"" AT CHECKOUT TO ADD YOUR FREE PERSONALIZED MESSAGE THROUGH AMAZON.🎈 50th 60th 40th birthday gifts for women 30th birthday gifts for her get well soon gift basket gifts for women gift basket for women self care gifts for women sister birthday gifts from sister']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Variety', 'Material Feature': 'Organic Ingredients, Vegan', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Yachyee', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Product Dimensions': '7.7 x 6.8 x 3.5 inches; 12 Ounces', 'UPC': '697478889727', 'Manufacturer': 'Yachyee'}
Review Text: I love that this gift comes packaged and ready. I threw a card and a bow on top and was able to give it to my sister in law for her birthday. She enjoyed it. It is a nice option for the people you never know what to get!
Review Title: Easy gift!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bridal Hair Comb Gold Leaf Crystal Hair Vine Bridal Hair Accessories Rhinestone Headpiece
Review Date: 2022/09/07
Store: FIDDY898
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Material': 'Metal', 'Brand': 'FIDDY898', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Color': 'Gold', 'Power Source': 'Manual', 'Package Dimensions': '5.55 x 2.48 x 0.79 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FDTM00021-0811'}
Review Text: This hair clip is super beautiful and elegant. The size is awesome and the material is well made. It does need help staying in place though!
Review Title: Gorgeous piece
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: New Soft Hair Curlers Rollers,Heatless Curling Headband for Sleeping, No Heat Ponytail Hairband Hair Curler,Overnight Lazy Scrunchie Rollers Magic DIY Hair Styling Tools for Long Hair (pink)
Review Date: 2022/09/22
Store: NexMe
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Number of Items': '1', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Brand': 'NexMe', 'Color': 'Pink', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.91 x 4.53 x 1.57 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '799904670265'}
Review Text: I have really long hair and I had a difficult time using this curling set. It was hard to wrap all of my hair in to get it to work.
Review Title: Difficult to use.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details
    - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data

    Structure your response as:
   
    SUMMARY:
    [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The shopping history reveals a strong preference for high-quality, natural, and cruelty-free personal care products, especially lotions and skin moisturizers that address specific skin needs, such as dryness. The consistent positive ratings highlight appreciation for products that are effective, hydrating, and gentle, suitable for both self-use and for children, suggesting a focus on health-conscious choices.

In addition to skincare, there's also a trend toward functional and aesthetically pleasing grooming and beauty accessories, with products like hair accessories and DIY nail kits indicating an interest in personal appearance and self-expression. The individual appears discerning about product length and fit, as seen in the feedback on faux nails.

Price sensitivity is moderately indicated by the preference for natural and cruelty-free options, which can often be priced higher, yet reviews show satisfaction with value for quality. Overall, the shopper leans towards high-quality, thoughtfully designed products, with an emphasis on practicality and subtle aesthetics over extravagance. They also value ease of use in beauty tools, reflecting a desire for convenience in their beauty routine.

target_interaction.title: Soft, cute and does the job!
target_interaction.text: These shower caps are exactly what I was looking for. My daughter’s curly hair can’t be washed every day and she can’t figure out how to shower or bathe without getting her hair wet. This is the perfect solution. She likes them because they are cute with the bow. I like them because they are easy to put on and her hair stays dry!
target_interaction.title_meta: Shower Cap for Women Reusable Long Hair Double Waterproof Large Shower Hair Hat Adjustable (11 inches, Braids Black, Bowknot)

videos.title: Please watch this before buying! All you need to know!
My essential oil routine hands down
